item.title: 计票机太笨，不会带来黑客风险
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克想淘汰所有电子投票机，而选举官员认为这不是个好主意。但首先...【原文：Elon Musk wants to get rid of all electronic voting machines, and election officials think that’s a bad idea. But first...】

item.title: 中国房地产刺激政策出台后，碧桂园销售低迷有所缓解
item.description: 中国建筑商碧桂园控股有限公司（Country Garden Holdings Co.【原文：Chinese builder Country Garden Holdings Co.’s sales slump moderated in October, a sign of improving industry prospects following China’s stimulus blitz that include measures for property developers.】

item.title: 俄罗斯大亨乌斯马诺夫支付 400 万欧元和解德国刑事调查
item.description: 被制裁的俄罗斯亿万富翁阿利舍尔-乌斯马诺夫支付了 400 万欧元（440 万美元），以了结德国检察官的洗钱调查。【原文：Sanctioned Russian billionaire Alisher Usmanov paid €4 million ($4.4 million) to settle a money laundering investigation by German prosecutors.】

item.title: 顶级杂货商露露将阿布扎比首次公开募股规模提高至 17.2 亿美元
item.description: 露露零售控股公司（Lulu Retail Holdings Plc）增加了在阿布扎比首次公开发行股票的数量，目前的目标是在阿联酋今年最大的一次上市中筹集多达 17.2 亿美元的资金。【原文：Lulu Retail Holdings Plc increased the number of shares on offer in its Abu Dhabi initial public offering, and now targets raising as much as $1.72 billion in the United Arab Emirates’ biggest listing of the year.】

item.title: 大选赌博市场面临关键时刻
item.description: 长期以来，预测市场一直受到经济学家和投资者的喜爱。即使是爱荷华电子市场这样的小众平台，以及福特汽车公司等公司内部的投注池，在预测未来方面都被认为优于其他平台。【原文：Prediction markets have long been loved by economists and investors alike. Even niche platforms such as the Iowa Electronic Markets and betting pools inside companies like Ford Motor Co. all have been found to be superior than the alternatives in telling the future.】

item.title: 如果特朗普赢得大选，韩国将考虑购买更多美国能源
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，如果唐纳德-特朗普赢得大选并加大对贸易伙伴的压力，韩国正在考虑一项增加从美国进口能源的计划。【原文：South Korea is considering a plan to boost energy imports from the US if Donald Trump wins the election and steps up pressure on trade partners, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 白俄罗斯总统提议削减与俄罗斯的钾肥产量
item.description: 据国营 Belta 新闻社报道，白俄罗斯总统亚历山大-卢卡申科建议与俄罗斯化肥生产商接洽，协调钾肥减产 10%，以提高市场价格。【原文：Belarusian President Alexander Lukashenko proposed approaching Russian fertilizer producers to coordinate a 10% potash output cut to increase its price on the market, according to the state-run Belta news service.】

item.title: 瑞典拒绝了 13 个波罗的海风电项目，理由是这些项目存在安全风险，可能会受到俄罗斯的威胁
item.description: 瑞典政府否决了波罗的海的 13 个海上风力发电厂，认为它们会对瑞典抵御俄罗斯威胁的能力构成风险。【原文：The Swedish government rejected 13 offshore wind parks in the Baltic Sea deemed to pose a risk to the nation’s ability to protect itself against threats from Russia.】

item.title: StanChart Crypto Custodian Zodia 正在洽谈 5000 万美元融资事宜
item.description: 渣打银行（Standard Chartered Plc.【原文：Standard Chartered Plc’s digital assets storage business Zodia Custody Ltd. is in talks to raise a fresh round of capital, as competition heats up in the growing market for crypto safekeeping.】

item.title: 无胆"：加拿大首席执行官们被特鲁多崛起的竞争对手所震惊
item.description: 多伦多金融区的道明银行大厦（TD Bank Tower）是一座气势恢宏的玻璃钢建筑，大厦 54 层聚集的人群堪称加拿大商界精英的 "名人录"。这里有首席执行官、科技大亨和银行家，他们为了有机会聆听保守党领袖皮埃尔-波利耶夫尔（Pierre Poilievre）的演讲，每人支付了高达 1725 加元的费用。【原文：The crowd gathered on the 54th floor of TD Bank Tower, an imposing glass-and-steel edifice in Toronto’s financial district, was a who’s who of the Canadian business elite. There were CEOs and tech moguls and bankers who had paid as much as C$1,725 each for a chance to hear from Pierre Poilievre, the leader of the Conservative Party.】

item.title: 儿童自杀后，TikTok 在法国被多个家庭起诉
item.description: 七个法国家庭将 TikTok 告上法庭，指责这款社交网络应用损害了他们孩子的心理健康，并导致其中两人自杀。【原文：TikTok was sued by a group of seven French families who blame the social network app for harming the mental health of their children, driving two of them to suicide.】

item.title: 交易员缩减对特朗普胜选的押注，新兴资产跳涨
item.description: 新兴市场资产上涨，投资者削减了支持唐纳德-特朗普在美国总统大选中获胜的头寸，尽管两位候选人的竞争依然激烈。【原文：Emerging-market assets gained, with investors curbing positions favoring a Donald Trump victory in the US presidential election even as the candidates remain locked in a tight race.】

item.title: 华尔街认为美国民调后债券收益率将推动股市走势
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & co.）和摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）的策略师一致认为：债券收益率将决定美国股市在周二大选后的走势。【原文：Strategists at JPMorgan Chase & co. and Morgan Stanley agree: bond yields will set the direction of travel for US equities in the aftermath of Tuesday’s election.】

item.title: 中国审议地方政府隐性债务再融资计划
item.description: 中国最高立法机构审议了将部分地方政府的表外债务转入其官方账户的提案，这是官员们早有预兆的减轻地方政府财政负担的一项备受期待的举措。【原文：China’s top legislative body reviewed a proposal to move some local governments’ off-balance-sheet debt onto their official accounts, a highly-anticipated move to ease their financial burden that has been foreshadowed by officials.】

item.title: 南非汽油价格六个月来首次上涨
item.description: 由于国际油价上涨抵消了兰特走强的影响，南非汽油价格将在六个月内首次上涨。【原文：South African gasoline prices will increase for the first time in six months as rising international oil prices offset the impact of a stronger rand.】

item.title: 特斯拉中国 10 月出货量继一季度大幅增长后出现下滑
item.description: 在埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的汽车制造商特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc.【原文：Tesla Inc.’s Shanghai factory deliveries slipped in October, the unexpected softness coming after a record quarter for China shipments at Elon Musk’s carmaker.】

item.title: 阿达尼公司就 8.5 亿美元欠款向孟加拉国施压
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）的发电公司正在加大对孟加拉国的施压力度，试图收回超过 8.5 亿美元的未付电费。【原文：Billionaire Gautam Adani’s power generation unit is stepping up pressure on Bangladesh as it seeks to recover more than $850 million of unpaid electricity bills, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 受当地报纸卖出提示影响，房东SBB跌幅创2023年5月以来最大
item.description: 瑞典房地产集团 SBB 周一在斯德哥尔摩暴跌 27%，此前《工业日报》建议读者卖出该股。【原文：Swedish real estate group SBB tumbled as much as 27% in Stockholm on Monday after newspaper Dagens Industri advised readers to sell the stock.】

item.title: 中国对冲基金经理因商业机密案遭美国起诉
item.description: 据知情人士透露，风头正劲的中国量化对冲基金品石资产管理公司（Pinestone Asset Management Co.【原文：A co-founder of high-flying Chinese quantitative hedge fund Pinestone Asset Management Co. has been indicted in the US for alleged theft of trade secrets, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: SK Hynix 在 Nvidia 的敦促下加速发布新型 AI 芯片
item.description: 在英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）首席执行官黄仁勋（Jensen Huang）询问韩国供应商能否比原计划提前六个月提供样品后，SK 海力士公司（SK Hynix Inc.首席执行官黄仁勋（Jensen Huang）询问这家韩国供应商能否比原计划提前六个月提供样品，这表明全球对尖端半导体的需求持续增长。【原文：SK Hynix Inc. is accelerating the launch of its next-generation AI memory chips after Nvidia Corp. Chief Executive Officer Jensen Huang asked the South Korean supplier if it can provide samples six months earlier than originally planned, signaling persistent global demand for cutting-edge semiconductors.】

item.title: 美国音乐文艺复兴人昆西-琼斯逝世，享年 91 岁
item.description: 昆西-琼斯（Quincy Jones）去世，他作为表演家、作曲家、编曲家和媒体执行官，在长达六十多年的时间里突破了音乐和商业障碍。享年 91 岁。【原文：Quincy Jones, who broke through musical and business barriers during more than six decades as a performer, composer, arranger and media executive, has died. He was 91.】

item.title: 埃兹拉-克莱因谈拜登经济学的遗产
item.description:
在哈里斯或特朗普政府的领导下，产业政策会发生什么变化？【原文：

What happens to industrial policy under a Harris or Trump administration?

】

item.title: 奇货可居：埃兹拉-克莱因谈拜登经济学的遗产（播客）
item.description: 奇货可居：埃兹拉-克莱因谈拜登经济学的遗产（播客）【原文：Odd Lots: Ezra Klein On the Legacy of Bidenomics (Podcast)】

item.title: 赞比亚股权提升采矿计划不会触及现有项目
item.description: 赞比亚一位高级政府官员表示，赞比亚计划在一些采矿项目中获得更大的股份，但这不会影响该国现有的业务，包括勘探活动。【原文：Zambia’s plans to take bigger stakes in some mining projects won’t impact existing operations in the country, including exploration activities, according to a senior government official.】

item.title: 阿布扎比与微软合作将人工智能引入能源行业
item.description: 阿布扎比主要石油公司与 AIQ 达成协议，利用人工智能提高能源行业的效率。【原文：Abu Dhabi’s main oil company and AIQ agreed on a deal to use artificial intelligence to make the energy industry more efficient.】

item.title: 高盛比南非财政部长更看好南非
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc）认为，南非不太可能出现财政部长预计的巨大收入缺口，该国的财政整顿之路仍然可信。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc believes South Africa is unlikely to suffer the large revenue shortfall projected by its finance minister and that the nation’s path for fiscal consolidation remains credible.】

item.title: 美国大选转移盈利焦点，欧洲股市保持稳定
item.description: 欧洲股市周一持稳，投资者的注意力从较为清淡的财报转向即将到来的美国总统大选，鉴于近期对关税的担忧，美国总统大选是该地区股市的一个关键风险事件。【原文：European stocks were steady Monday as investor attention turned from a lighter earnings slate to the upcoming US presidential election, a key risk event for the region’s equities given recent worries over tariffs.】

item.title: 预算忧虑消退，英国债券保持稳定，焦点转向美国投票
item.description: 英国债券周一企稳，上周因政府借贷和支出计划引发的市场溃败有所缓解，投资者现在开始关注美国大选和英国央行的利率决定。【原文：UK bonds stabilized Monday as a market rout sparked last week by the government’s borrowing and spending plans abated, with investors now turning to the US election and the Bank of England interest-rate decision.】

item.title: 比特币交易员为美国投票前的激烈价格波动做好准备
item.description: 比特币投机者正在为周二美国大选日后可能出现的明显市场波动做好准备。【原文：Bitcoin speculators are bracing for potentially pronounced market volatility in the aftermath of Election Day in the US on Tuesday.】

item.title: 阿曼能源公司在首次公开募股热潮中出售最多 49% 的甲醇业务
item.description: 阿曼国有能源公司 OQ SAOC 公布了其甲醇和液化石油气部门的首次公开募股计划，延续了中东地区新闻股票销售的热潮。【原文：Oman’s state energy company OQ SAOC unveiled plans for an initial public offering of its methanol and liquefied petroleum gas unit, extending the boom of news share sales in the Middle East.】
